results.content:
This is a very good beginners course.
Interesting to see what can be done in Flash without using any code. The author makes it all look very simple with good examples.
The only drawback is that there is something wrong with the downloadable files as they can not be removed from my PC/Windows 8.1. The system does not seem to recognize their location? Otherwise they work alright.
results.content_html:
This is a very good beginners course.
Interesting to see what can be done in Flash without using any code. The author makes it all look very simple with good examples.
The only drawback is that there is something wrong with the downloadable files as they can not be removed from my PC/Windows 8.1. The system does not seem to recognize their location? Otherwise they work alright.
